definition: Yokohama, Japan
harsh and unreasonable/unexpected

horizontal/across/crosswise/horizontal stroke (in Chinese characters)/to place (sth) flat (on a surface)/to cross (a river, etc)/in a jumble/chaotic/(in fixed expressions) harsh and unreasonable/violent
shore/beach/coast/bank/to border on
Yokohama, major port city in Kanagawa prefecture 神奈川縣|神奈川县[Shen2 nai4 chuan1 xian4], Japan

sentences.english: I lived in Yokohama two summers ago, so I know a little about it.
sentences.chinese: 我两年前的夏天在横滨住过，所以我略知一二。

sentences.english: President Hu Jintao will visit Yokohama Yamate Chinese School Friday, a learning institution originally initiated by Sun Yat-sen.
sentences.chinese: 今日，胡锦涛主席将到日本横滨山手中华学校参观。

sentences.english: Kaka and Inzaghi are the same of Athens, Monetcarlo and Yokohama.
sentences.chinese: 卡卡和因扎吉还有在雅典，摩纳哥和横滨一样的表现。

sentences.english: Then the city and the harbor of Yokohama , in a thousand pictures, began flashing before his eyes.
sentences.chinese: 于是横滨市和横滨港以其千姿百态在他眼前闪过。

sentences.english: Then the city and the harbor of Yokohama , in a thousand pictures, began flashing before his eyes.
sentences.chinese: 于是横滨市和横滨港以其千姿百态在他眼前闪过。

sentences.english: But the biggest innovations aren't only happening in Detroit and Yokohama.
sentences.chinese: 但最大的创新并不只发生在底特律和横滨。

sentences.english: Yokohama City Health authorities are investigating the cause.
sentences.chinese: 横滨市卫生当局正在调查病因。

sentences.english: Currently, the Yokohama Maritime Security Department is investigating cause of the accident.
sentences.chinese: 目前，横滨海上保安部正在对事故原因展开调查。

sentences.english: Destiny, just this, played two nasty trick on us, at Yokohama and at La Coruna.
sentences.chinese: 但是命运却在横滨和拉科鲁尼亚和我们开了两次玩笑。

sentences.english: For Yokohama, the goal is to reduce incinerated garbage by 30 percent over the next five years.
sentences.chinese: 横滨的目标是在今后五年里减少30%的垃圾焚烧量。

sentences.english: Japan hosts heads of government at an Asia-Pacific Economic Co-operation summit in Yokohama.
sentences.chinese: 日本作为东道主，在横滨举办亚非经济合作峰会。

sentences.english: Though his offices were in Kobe, Burton often came down to Yokohama.
sentences.chinese: 尽管伯顿的办公室在神户，但他常驻来横滨。

sentences.english: Japan's second-largest city after Tokyo, Yokohama is easily reached from Tokyo by train.
sentences.chinese: 从东京搭火车，很容易就能抵达日本第二大城市横滨。
